List.Name: Casanova di Neri Brunello di Montalcino Cerretalto 2007
Wine Tasting Party Kit
List.Description:
This all-inclusive kit makes hosting a wine tasting party easy and a lot of fun! Kit includes a booklet which outlines the ins and outs of tasting wine and provides ideas for what wines to taste first. Fabric wine bottle covers allow for a blind tasting, while score pads provide the perfect place to jot down notes and rate favorites. Learning about wine has never been so festive and fun!

Kit Includes:

  • 64-page illustrated booklet
  • 4 tasting notepads
  • 100 Wineglass markers
  • 4 reusable cloth wine bottle covers
  • Cheat sheet of tasting terms

Napa Valley Wine Gift Trio
List.Description:
Enjoy the diverse selection of California's most famous valley in this trio of wines, emphasizing the freshness of Sauvignon Blanc from Stags Leap District, the elegance of Carneros Pinot Noir and the power of Rutherford Cabernet Sauvignon.

Wine Gift Trio Includes:

  • Silverado Miller Ranch Sauvignon Blanc
    Ideal for cooler climates with well-drained soils, this pungent variety creates wines with aromas of citrus and stone fruits, backed by a touch of herbaceousness. The Miller Ranch Sauvignon Blanc delivers a rich texture akin to tropical fruit, yet zingy acidity keeps it fresh and lively as the varietal should be.

  • Cuvaison Pinot Noir
    Enjoying the cool winds of the San Pablo Bay, Carneros is the perfect location for cool-climate varieties like Chardonnay and Pinot Noir. The classic style of Carneros Pinot Noir, such as this one from Cuvaison, displays bright fruit, sweet spice and a vibrant finish.

  • Conn Creek Cabernet Sauvignon
    Napa Valley and Cabernet go hand in hand, and the grape particularly shines in the heart of Napa: the Rutherford Valley. This Cabernet from the valley floor offers dense fruit, chocolate notes and a touch of oak spice.

  • Printed insert that describes the featured wines

    Due to the popularity of this gift, vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage.

Williams Selyem Estate Vineyard Pinot Noir 2010
Unwind with Rewined Candle and Canard-Duchene Gift Set
List.Description:
Unwind by lighting a Rewined candle and opening a bottle of Canard-Duchene Champage Rose'. These luxury candles are made from repurposed wine bottles, and filled with oils carefully blended to develop a fragrance that embraces the delicious flavors and aromas of Champagne. Coupled with this long lasting candle is a bottle of 91 pt rated Canard-Duchene Authentic Brut Rose', a very elegant wine, with graphite, cherry and citrus aromas and flavors. This makes a great gift for wine lovers, candle lovers, or those who love all things green.

Wine Gift Includes:

  • Canard-Duchene Authentic Brut Rose:
    The Champagne stands apart for its intense, fresh fruit aromas of strawberries, with a subtle hint of grenadine, against a backdrop of mineral notes for enhanced freshness.

  • Rewined Signature Wine Bottle Candle
    11 oz hand poured premium soy wax candle. This glass container is hand crafted from recycled wine bottles. The luxurious candle fragrance is inspired by the Champagne wine varietals.

    Due to the popularity of this gift, vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage.

Riedel Vinum -Set of 2 Chardonnay/Viognier Glasses
List.Description:
Vinum was the first machine-made series of glasses in history based exclusively on the characteristics of grape varietals. Vinum has had a permanent impact on the globe's wine culture. These glasses have proved that the pleasures of consuming wine start with the glass.

The Vinum Chardonnay/Viognier glass is ideally suited for the best qualities of light, dry white wines.

Recommended for: Chardonnay (especially lighter style white Burgundy such as Chablis), Chenin Blanc, Sauvignon Blanc, Pinot Grigio and Viognier. Each glass stands 7 3/4" high and holds 12 3/8 oz. Boxed set of 2.

Wine sold separately.

See other Riedel Vinum sizes and styles

The Vinum series is made from 24% lead crystal.

Attention California residents. Proposition 65 warning:
Consuming foods or beverages that have been kept or served in leaded crystal products or handling products made of leaded crystal will expose you to lead, a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm.
